mapper.select: select rd.coinid, rd.amount,sbbi.evaluate,rd.evaluate guestappraisal,rd.score,rd.remark,rd.numindex,rd.totalreqcost,rd.totalevaluate, rd.amountofissue,rd.guestappraisal,rd.wmk,rd.whetherSample,rd.blockNum,sbbi.years,rd.whetherSeries,box.money as boxCost, sbbi.fullsubject,sbbi.fullsubject,sbbi.shortsubject,sbbi.facevaluedis,st.shortname as guojia,rd.version from request_detail rd,sys_bill_basic_info sbbi,sys_country st,sys_box_basic_info box where rd.coinid= sbbi.id and sbbi.country = st.id AND box.id=sbbi.boxid and rd.requestid =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY rd.numindex

SELECT rc.id, rc.coincode,sbbi.years,sc.shortname as guojia,sbbi.fullsubject,sbbi.facevaluedis,rc.customSize, rc.blockNum,sbbi.size,sbbi.shading,sbbi.placenames,sbbi.sign,rc.difversion as version,rd.wmk,rc.remark as coinremark, (CASE WHEN r.serviceid = 1 THEN '新评' WHEN r.serviceid = 2 THEN '重评' WHEN r.serviceid = 5 THEN '真品鉴定' END ) serviceid,rd.requestid,rcs.level,rc.score,rc.ratingreasondis,rc.difversioncode, rc.whetherSample from request_coin rc left join request_coin_score rcs on rcs.requestcoinid=rc.id, request_detail rd,sys_bill_basic_info sbbi,sys_country sc,request_main r where rd.id=rc.requestdetailid AND sbbi.country=sc.id AND rd.coinid=sbbi.id AND rd.requestid=r.id AND rc.coincode=#{coincode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY rc.coincode

SELECT rc.id, rc.coincode,sbbi.years,sc.shortname as guojia,sbbi.fullsubject,sbbi.facevaluedis,rc.customSize, rc.blockNum,sbbi.size,sbbi.shading,sbbi.placenames,sbbi.sign,rc.difversion as version,rd.wmk,rc.remark as coinremark, rd.requestid,rcs.level,rc.score,rc.ratingreasondis,rc.difversioncode, rc.whetherSample from request_coin rc left join request_coin_score rcs on rcs.requestcoinid=rc.id, request_detail rd,sys_bill_basic_info sbbi,sys_country sc,request_main r where rd.id=rc.requestdetailid AND sbbi.country=sc.id AND rd.coinid=sbbi.id AND rd.requestid=r.id AND rc.id=#{requestcoinid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by rc.coincode

SELECT r.entitytype,r.requestcode,rc.coincode,rc.tagindex,rc.remark,rc.ratingreasondis, rd.evaluate,rd.numindex,r.usercode,r.customer,r.mobile, r.mail,r.serviceid,r.speed,r.totalamount,r.totalweight,r.totalpreferential,r.othercost, r.totalevaluate,r.totalreqcost,r.totalpremium,r.totaltransportation, r.totalinsurance,r.totalcost,r.sendtype,r.payment, rc.score, ExtractValue(co.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']") as country, ExtractValue(p.name, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']") as province, ExtractValue(c.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']") as city, ExtractValue(d.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']") as area, ExtractValue(co1.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']") as coincountry, r.address,r.paystatus,rd.guestappraisal,rd.totalreqcost as totalcoincost, rd.coinid,num.gpn as sameCoinNum FROM (SELECT rc1.coincode as coincode,rc1.coinid as cid,count(*) as gpn FROM request_coin rc1 LEFT JOIN request_detail rd1 ON rc1.requestid = rd1.requestid AND rc1.coinid = rd1.coinid LEFT JOIN request_main r1 ON rc1.requestid = r1.id LEFT JOIN sys_bill_basic_info sbbi ON rc1.coinid = sbbi.id WHERE r1.requestcode =#{requestcode,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by rc1.coinid) num,request_coin rc LEFT JOIN request_detail rd ON rc.requestid = rd.requestid AND rc.coinid = rd.coinid LEFT JOIN request_main r ON rc.requestid = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_country co ON r.country = co.id LEFT JOIN sys_province p ON r.province = p.id LEFT JOIN sys_city c ON r.city = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_district d ON r.area = d.id LEFT JOIN sys_bill_basic_info sbbi ON rc.coinid = sbbi.id LEFT JOIN sys_country co1 on co1.id=sbbi.country WHERE r.requestcode =#{requestcode,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND num.cid=rd.coinid ORDER BY coincode ASC

SELECT sbbi.id, catalogue,billnum,sdbti.bill_type_name,reign,years,c.shortname as guojia,bank,fullsubject,size,remarks, shortsubject,facevaluedis,wmk,placenames,sign,version,pattern,shading,color,printingcompany,evaluate,box.money as boxCost, CONCAT_WS('',sdbti.bill_type_name,reign,years,c.shortname,bank,fullsubject,commonlysubject, shortsubject,facevaluedis,wmk,placenames,sign,version,pattern,shading,color,printingcompany) from sys_bill_basic_info sbbi,sys_dictionary_bill_type_info sdbti, sys_country c,sys_box_basic_info box where sdbti.bill_type_code=sbbi.billtype and c.id=sbbi.country and box.id=sbbi.boxid
and sbbi.years like CONCAT("%",#{years},"%")
and sbbi.country =#{country}
and sbbi.facevaluedis like CONCAT("%",#{facevaluedis},"%")
and sbbi.version like CONCAT("%",#{version},"%")
and sbbi.wmk like CONCAT("%",#{wmk},"%")
and CONCAT_WS('',sdbti.bill_type_name,reign,years,c.fullname,bank,fullsubject,commonlysubject, shortsubject,facevaluedis,wmk,placenames,sign,version,pattern,shading,color,printingcompany) like CONCAT("%",#{item},"%")
and sbbi.billnum =#{billnum}
and sbbi.placenames like CONCAT("%",#{placenames},"%")
and sbbi.sign like CONCAT("%",#{sign},"%")
and sbbi.pattern like CONCAT("%",#{pattern},"%")
and sbbi.color like CONCAT("%",#{color},"%")
limit #{startRow},15

SELECT rc.id,rc.coincode,sbbi.years,sc.shortname as guojia,sbbi.fullsubject,sbbi.facevaluedis, rc.blockNum,sbbi.size,sbbi.shading,sbbi.placenames,sbbi.sign,rc.difversion,rd.wmk, rcs.score,rcs.scoreby,rcs.`level`,rcs.remark,rc.remark as pubremark,rcs.ratingreasondis, rc.whetherSample from request_coin rc LEFT JOIN request_coin_score rcs on rcs.requestcoinid=rc.id and rcs.scoreby=#{scoreby} AND `level`='1', request_detail rd,sys_bill_basic_info sbbi, sys_country sc where rd.id=rc.requestdetailid AND sbbi.country=sc.id AND rd.coinid=sbbi.id AND rc.requestid=#{requestid} ORDER BY rc.coincode

SELECT rc.id,rc.coincode,sbbi.years,sc.shortname as guojia,sbbi.fullsubject,sbbi.facevaluedis, rc.blockNum,sbbi.size,sbbi.shading,sbbi.placenames,sbbi.sign,rc.difversion,rd.wmk, rcs.score,rcs.scoreby,rcs.`level`,rcs.remark,rc.remark as pubremark,rcs.ratingreasondis, rc.whetherSample from request_coin rc LEFT JOIN request_coin_score rcs on rcs.requestcoinid=rc.id, request_detail rd,sys_bill_basic_info sbbi, sys_country sc where rd.id=rc.requestdetailid AND sbbi.country=sc.id AND rd.coinid=sbbi.id AND rc.requestid=#{requestid} ORDER BY rc.coincode,rcs.level,rcs.scoreby

SELECT rc.id,rc.coincode,sbbi.years,sc.shortname as guojia,sbbi.fullsubject,sbbi.facevaluedis,rc.blockNum,rc.score,rc.ratingreasondis, rc.difversion as version,rd.wmk,rc.whetherSample from request_coin rc, request_detail rd,sys_bill_basic_info sbbi,sys_country sc where rd.id=rc.requestdetailid AND sbbi.country=sc.id AND rd.coinid=sbbi.id AND rd.requestid = #{requestid} ORDER BY rc.coincode

SELECT c.years, c.catalogue, c.shortsubject, c.version, c.facevaluedis, ExtractValue ( t.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) AS country, rc.score, rc.coincode, rc.difversion, rc.ratingreasondis FROM sys_bill_basic_info c, sys_country t, request_coin rc WHERE rc.coincode LIKE CONCAT(#{requestCode}, '%') AND rc.coinid = c.id AND t.id = c.country ORDER BY coincode

SELECT c.years, c.catalogue, c.billnum, c.shortsubject, c.fullsubject, c.version, c.facevaluedis, c.size, c.wmk, c.bank, ExtractValue ( t.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) country, c.sign, rc.score, rc.coincode, rc.difversioncode, c.printingcompany, c.placenames, rc.difversion, rc.ratingreasondis, rc.blocknum, c.printingcompany FROM sys_bill_basic_info c, sys_country t, request_coin rc WHERE rc.coincode LIKE CONCAT(#{requestCode}, '%') AND rc.coinid = c.id AND t.id = c.country ORDER BY coincode

SELECT c.years, c.catalogue, c.billnum, c.enshortsubject shortsubject, c.enfullsubject fullsubject, c.enversion version, c.enfacevaluedis facevaluedis, c.size, c.enwmk wmk, c.enbank bank, ExtractValue ( t.fullname, "//value[@lang='en_US']" ) country, c.ensign sign, rc.score, rc.coincode, rc.difversioncode, "" printingcompany, c.enplacenames placenames, rc.difversion, rc.ratingreasondis, rc.blocknum, c.printingcompany, ( SELECT rr.reasonname_us FROM request_bill_net_reason_data nr, rating_reason rr WHERE rr.Id = nr.netreasoncode AND nr.netreasoncode != 1000 AND nr.requestcoinid = rc.id LIMIT 1 ) netreason FROM sys_bill_basic_info c, sys_country t, request_coin rc WHERE rc.coincode LIKE CONCAT(#{requestCode}, '%') AND rc.coinid = c.id AND t.id = c.country ORDER BY coincode
